term.title: rate of conversion

item.text: The rate of conversion for a reaction occurring in a closed system is defined as the time derivative of the extent of reaction: ξ . = d ξ d t is the amount of the species at any time and ν i is its stoichiometric coefficient.

item.alttext: ξ . = d ξ d t = 1 ν i d n i d t
